[WSS-124] - Changed opensaml dependency  - We're now pulling in opensaml 1.1 from maven central  - The repositories section of the pom is removed as a result  - I changed the scope of opensaml to be "provided". git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/wss4j/trunk@710081 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[WSS-242] - Patch applied  - I removed all of the static methods from WSSecSignature, and put them in a new file WSSecSignatureBase instead.  - Maven plugin verisons added back into the pom. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/wss4j/trunk@998467 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Committing some fixes to get CXF working with WSS4J 1.6  - This merge breaks checkstyle...I'll fix this asap.  - The STR Transform requires some work as well. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/wss4j/trunk@1031122 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
